{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = AC2200 Nighthawk X4S Tri-Band Range Extender |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-range-extenders/EX7500.aspx |sp = https://www.netgear.com/support/product/EX7500 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Netgear |model = EX7500 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC22003R |series = Nighthawk X4S |type = range extender |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY317100373, PY316400361 |icid = 4054A-17100373 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = U12H340T05, <!--U12H361T00,--> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4019; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 716 <!-- 716 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML02G200TFV00; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types =
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.2 |pwr_conn = AC (direct)
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = 256QAM, |addchip = 2.4GHz 256QAM WLAN Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85325-11;SKY11, 85325, 702XN;2; ,,, 5GHz WLAN Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85729-11;SKY, 729, 2D00b;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U12H340 |manuf_rev = T05 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/14/2017 |estreldate = 10/20/2017 |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |estprice = 180 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0762QT7S6 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Vietnam
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 400 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = 400 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|rad3chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9886; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = 2 |rad3rxchains = 2 |rad3sstreams = 2 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad3ac = 867 |nqam3 = 400 |rad3n = 300 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== * Web GUI: http://www.mywifiext.net
"U12H340T05" and "802391 REV.0 GP" is silkscreened on the board :in the FCC photos (OEM: [[Foxconn]], -100NAS). "U12H361T00 LF", "ZPL001F", and "2144002234-01S1" are printed :on a label on the board in the FCC photos. <!--{{FCC ST|03/14/2018|indexme.}}--> {{See also|Netgear Orbi Wall Plug Satellite (RBW30)}}
==See also== *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices#AC2200]] *[[List of Netgear Nighthawk Products]]
